cards.title: Anonymous registration
cards.text: No verified email required. Create an account in seconds, with no friction and no forced identity.

cards.title: Chronological feed
cards.text: Posts are shown in real-time order, with no algorithm or hidden sorting. What you see is what was posted.

cards.title: No infinite scroll
cards.text: Browse posts at your own pace, with no addictive loop. A healthy, mindful experience.

cards.title: No tracking, no ads
cards.text: Agora doesnâ€™t collect your data and never pushes consumption. No advertising, ever.

cards.title: Optional mini profile
cards.text: You can add a photo, a link to your website, and view your own stats (likes, comments, shared images).

cards.title: Respect is mandatory
cards.text: Agora is a kind space. Any harmful or toxic behavior will result in an immediate ban.

cards.title: In testing, with you
cards.text: Agora is a prototype in evolution. Your feedback is welcome to co-create a more human space.

cards.title: Why Agora?
cards.text: Because you deserve a space for expression, free of filters and influence. Simple. Human. Authentic.
